params._maxEthToPay: maximum ETH to pay to buy back the owed wSqueeth debt
params._poolFee: Uniswap pool fee for flash withdraw

params._eulerMainnet: address of euler deployment on mainnet

params._amount: amount of crabV1 shares to deposit

params._ethToBorrow: amount to flash loan to deposit in crab v2
params._ethToFlashDeposit: flash deposit amount in crab v2 with excess ETH (if 0 will returned to sender)
params._poolFee: uniswap pool fee for the optional flash deposit into crab v2
params._withdrawMaxEthToPay: maximum ETH to pay to buy back the owed wSqueeth debt

params._ethToFlashDeposit: flash deposit amount in crab v2 with excess ETH (if 0 will return to sender)
params._poolFee: uniswap pool fee for flash deposit

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._amount: amount of V1 shares to withdraw

batchMigrate(uint256).notice: the owner batch migrates all the crab V1 shares in this contract to crab V2 and initializes the V2 contract at the same collateral ratio as the V1 contract

claimAndWithdraw(uint256,uint256,uint24).notice: claim crab V2 shares and flash withdraw from crab V2

depositV1Shares(uint256).notice: deposit crab V1 shares in the pool for migration

flashMigrateAndWithdrawFromV1toV2(uint25.notice: used to migrate from crab V1 to crab V2 when CR1 < CR2

flashMigrateFromV1toV2(uint256,uint256,u.notice: used to migrate from crab V1 to crab V2 when CR1 >= CR2

flashMigrationDetails(uint256).notice: view details of flash migration for specified amount of V1 shares

withdrawV1Shares(uint256).notice: withdraw crab V1 shares in the pool before migration

userdoc.notice: Contract for Migrating from Crab V1 to Crab V2
